experience_and_leadership.title: Competitive Programming Club
experience_and_leadership.organization: ICPC, Benemérita Universidad Autónoma de Puebla
experience_and_leadership.description: Co-founded university ICPC club; teach algorithms and data structures to 15+ students. Lead C++ sessions on Dijkstra's, binary search, DFS/BFS, segment trees, and mathematics.

experience_and_leadership.title: Mentor
experience_and_leadership.description: Instructed students in 3D modeling with Onshape and SolidWorks, mechanics, electronics, and programming in C++ and Java. Guided 30+ middle and high school students, strengthening core STEM skills and leading a team.

experience_and_leadership.title: Judge and Mentor
experience_and_leadership.description: Founded and led Legion Kids, a program supporting children with post-pandemic learning gaps. Taught core concepts in math and English, including foundational topics in arithmetic and grammar, to 22 children aged 9-11.

experience_and_leadership.title: Math Instructor
experience_and_leadership.organization: SAFIRO - Educational Volunteering in the Sierra Norte
experience_and_leadership.description: Taught math to 30+ children (ages 6-12) across 4 groups in rural, low-resource communities. Applied tailored pedagogical methods to build logic, problem-solving, and engagement in learning.

projects_and_competitions.name: Expense Tracker
projects_and_competitions.description: Built finance app with customizable categories, transaction history, multi-currency support, and secure iCloud backup. Built using Figma, Swift and SwiftUI, integrating SwiftUICharts, Collections, and UIFontIcon for an optimized and refined UI.

projects_and_competitions.name: Vetopolis
projects_and_competitions.description: Built Vetopolis, a web app that helps users easily find veterinarians and book appointments. Developed with Figma, React.js, Node.js, and Firebase to ensure security, scalability, and a smooth user experience.

projects_and_competitions.name: Track My Bus
projects_and_competitions.description: Developed a mobile app providing real-time bus tracking and arrival updates for my university. Built with Figma, Dart in IntelliJ IDEA, integrating Google Maps APIs for live tracking.

projects_and_competitions.name: Star-Delta Circuit Calculator
projects_and_competitions.description: Developed a web app with Figma, TypeScript, CSS, and HTML to simplify voltage/current calculations in star and delta circuits. Used by Computer Engineering students as a support tool for mastering circuit analysis coursework.

projects_and_competitions.name: Algorithm & Data Structure Visualizer
projects_and_competitions.description: Built a visualizer with Vite and React.tsx for algorithms and data structures. Included Dijkstra's and graph traversal to show shortest path logic.

projects_and_competitions.name: 3D Modeling Manual | Onshape
projects_and_competitions.description: Built a comprehensive guide to Onshape, covering interface mastery and practical exercises on essential tools. Designed a final project to apply and reinforce 3D modeling skills.

projects_and_competitions.name: Assembly-Terminal
projects_and_competitions.description: Built a terminal interface in Assembly to run an interactive Hangman game. Used binary and hexadecimal operations for low-level I/O and game logic handling.

awards.achievement: Participation in the FEPRO programming tournament, ranked 4th in the advanced software applications category.
Participation in the FEPRO programming tournament, ranked 2nd.
Placing 7th and presenting the proposal with the project SATelite.
Classification to National Robotics Competition, in Torreón, Mexico. Ranked 6th of 30. Awarded the Control Award for outstanding participation and performance during the matches.
